page.title: 16Life styles in the eighties
page.content: There is a{depression}in the{1980's in the{Middlesbrough}area so the life style is not as good as in other parts of the country. In Middlesbrough and the surrounding areas{denim jeans}are in fashion. So are{short-sleeved}shirts, Adidas{ {training shoes,}Nike{sportswear}and Marks and Spencers' trousers. {BMX}(bicycle motor cross) bikes are going out of fashion and{racing}bikes are the latest fashion.{Television}and {radio}are a big part of our life styles. Problems in the 1980's are dominated by{football violence, drug} and{solvent abuse,}and{unemployment.
